ARABIC: لَّا تَدْعُوا۟ ٱلْيَوْمَ ثُبُورًا وَٰحِدًا وَٱدْعُوا۟ ثُبُورًا كَثِيرًا

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: 'Do not cry out today for just one destruction, cry out for many destructions!'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Do not ask for one death but many deaths on this day."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: (Then it will be said to them:) "Do not call for one death today, but call for many deaths."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: They will be told, "Do not pray to die only once but pray to die many times."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: It will be said “Do not pray this day for one death – and pray for many deaths.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Exclaim not today for one destruction, but exclaim for many destructions.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Call not this day for one destruction, but call for destructions many.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Call not out today for one destruction, but call for many!'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Pray not that day for one destruction, but pray for many destructions!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: But they will be told, "Do not call today for one death, call for many deaths!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Call not to-day for a single death but call for death manifold.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: [They will be told:] ‘Do not pray for a single annihilation today, but pray for many annihilations!’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: This day plead not for a single destruction: plead for destruction oft-repeated!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Exclaim not today for one destruction, but exclaim for many destructions.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Do not call out today for one destruction; call out for many destructions'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: “Do not plead for one death today, but plead for a great many deaths.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: [They will be told], "Do not cry this Day for one destruction but cry for much destruction."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [25:14] ‘Do not pray for a single annihilation on this day, but pray for many annihilations!’, which will be [the nature of] your chastisement.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: Allah will say to them: (Pray not that day for one destruction, but pray for many destructions) for what has befallen you!
